title.rendered: GB Easter Egg Hunt + Good Friday + News

content.rendered:
Good Friday Hours

We will be CLOSED on March 25 for Good Friday. Regular business hours will resume on Saturday. Happy Easter!

John 19:17-18
17 And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull, which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha: 18 Where they crucified him, and two others with him, on either side one, and Jesus in the midst.

Easter Egg Hunt

Join us in Macon and Warner Robins on Saturday, March 26 for an Easter egg hunt! Eggs will be filled with candy, and some will have vouchers for free books and toys. The eggs will be hidden throughout both stores. Please arrive by 10 a.m. sharp! Admission is free.

Best of the Best: Nominate and then Vote!

You can nominate Gottwals Books for the best bookstore in both Houston and Bibb counties until March 27. Then, come back and vote for us starting on April 10!

Now Hiring

Annual Franchise Meeting

We had a wonderful time with all of our Walls of Books franchisees. We motivated each other! We shared ideas, current projects, and upcoming initiatives. It was the first time all of our franchisees were together, and everyone went back home with new insights. These meetings allow us to become better people and better booksellers. We saw images and gave accounts of local events and projects each store is involved in. Walls of Books has a huge influence in cities nationwide.

Here’s what Shane Gottwals had to say: “I was taken aback… our franchise meeting helped me realize how much of an impact Walls of Books has. Our store owners provide an incredible value to each community. I love what we do, and they do too.”
